GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

APP_DATE.title: Date of Application
APP_DATE.instruction: Enter today's date in DD-MM-YYYY format.

APPLICANT_NAMES.title: Depositor Name(s)
APPLICANT_NAMES.instruction: Write the full name(s) of the account holder(s) who are making this nomination.

APPLICANT_ADDRESS.title: Depositor Address
APPLICANT_ADDRESS.instruction: Write your current residential address, including City, State, and Pin Code.

NOMINEE_NAME.title: Nominee Name
NOMINEE_NAME.instruction: Write the full name of the person you want to receive the money in the event of death.

NOMINEE_RELATION.title: Relationship with Depositor
NOMINEE_RELATION.instruction: Write how the nominee is related to you (e.g., Spouse, Son, Mother).

NOMINEE_DOB.title: Nominee Date of Birth
NOMINEE_DOB.instruction: Enter the nominee's Date of Birth. This is crucial to determine if they are a minor.

NOMINEE_ADDRESS.title: Nominee Address
NOMINEE_ADDRESS.instruction: Write the nominee's full address. If they live with you, you can write 'Same as Applicant'.

NOMINEE_CONTACT.title: Nominee Mobile Number
NOMINEE_CONTACT.instruction: Enter the nominee's mobile number for contact purposes.

NATURE_OF_DEPOSIT.title: Nature of Deposit
NATURE_OF_DEPOSIT.instruction:
Write the type of account you are adding a nominee to. 
Common examples include: 
1. 'Savings Account' 
2. 'Fixed Deposit' (or FD) 
3. 'Recurring Deposit' (or RD) 
4. 'Current Account'

DISTINGUISHING_NO.title: Distinguishing No. / Account No.
DISTINGUISHING_NO.instruction: Enter the specific Account Number or Deposit Certificate Number for which you are adding this nomination.

ADDITIONAL_DETAILS.title: Additional Details
ADDITIONAL_DETAILS.instruction: If there are any other details to identify the deposit (like a specific branch name or receipt number), write them here. Otherwise, leave blank.

GUARDIAN_DETAILS.title: Guardian Details (If Nominee is Minor)
GUARDIAN_DETAILS.instruction: FILL THIS ONLY IF THE NOMINEE IS UNDER 18. You must appoint an adult to receive the money on the minor's behalf. Enter their Name, Address, and Age.
rejections: Nominee is minor (based on DOB) but Guardian details are missing

SIGNATURE_1.title: Signature of First Depositor
SIGNATURE_1.instruction: The primary account holder must sign here. If using a thumb impression, you must also fill the Witness sections below.

SIGNATURE_2.title: Signature of Second Depositor
SIGNATURE_2.instruction: If the account is held jointly, the second holder must sign here.

SIGNATURE_3.title: Signature of Third Depositor
SIGNATURE_3.instruction: If there is a third holder, they must sign here.

WITNESS_1.title: Witness 1 Details
WITNESS_1.instruction: REQUIRED ONLY IF THUMB IMPRESSION IS USED. A witness must sign and provide their name and address to attest the thumb impression.
rejections: Thumb impression used but witness missing

WITNESS_2.title: Witness 2 Details
WITNESS_2.instruction: REQUIRED ONLY IF THUMB IMPRESSION IS USED. A second witness must sign and provide their name and address.
rejections: Thumb impression used but second witness missing

BANK_USE_ONLY.title: For Bank Use Only
BANK_USE_ONLY.instruction: This section is to be completed by bank officials only, including service request number, employee details, and branch code.
